text: The Zimbabwe national cricket team, also known as Chevrons represents Zimbabwe in men's international cricket. Zimbabwe Cricket (earlier known as the Zimbabwe Cricket Union) controls the cricket team. Zimbabwe has been a Full Member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) since 1992. As of March, 2022, Zimbabwe is currently ranked 10th in Tests, 13th in One Day Internationals (ODIs) and 11th in Twenty20 Internationals (T20Is) by the ICC. == References == == Other websites == * Nyambi, Oliver (2019). Life-writing from the margins in Zimbabwe : versions and subversions of crisis. Abingdon, Oxon. ISBN 978-0-429-43469-3. title: Zimbabwe men's national cricket team
